name: List and Dictionary Operations
description: Demonstrate basic list and dictionary operations.
instructions: Run the code to see list and dictionary operations.
starter:
# List operations
fruits = ['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']
fruits.append('date')
print('Fruits:', fruits)
# Dictionary operations
person = {'name': 'Alice', 'age': 20}
person['city'] = 'London'
print('Person:', person)

files./list_and_dict.py:
# List operations
fruits = ['apple', 'banana', 'cherry']
fruits.append('date')
print('Fruits:', fruits)
# Dictionary operations
person = {'name': 'Alice', 'age': 20}
person['city'] = 'London'
print('Person:', person)
